__e: There are people here who were with the party that killed my father.
Whatever it is you had to do with my brother's killers, I don't wanna know.
In my grandfather's country, they say a man should not live under the same sky as his father's murderers.
You do realize that Ben probably knew his killers and anything you can tell us will help us find them? I'm sorry.
I know how much, you know, you guys have on your hands, like murderers and robbers and gangs and stuff.
It's a good thing I don't believe in assassins, and I never did.
